com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history

Interface FlowHistoryRepository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to which FlowEvent data has been serialised.
    All Superinterfaces:
    TraceEventListener

    public interface FlowHistoryRepository<T>
extends TraceEventListener
    A repository which stores the TraceMap and history of FlowEvents for executed flows.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlowHistory<T> getFlowHistory(UUID flowId)
      Retrieve the FlowHistory for the given flow id.
      void storeTraceMap(UUID flowId, TraceMap traceMap)
      Store the TraceMap giving a map of all of the flow's possible execution paths.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing.TraceEventListener

        stepFailed, stepStarted, stepSucceeded

    • Method Detail

      • storeTraceMap

        void storeTraceMap(UUID flowId,
                   TraceMap traceMap)
        Store the TraceMap giving a map of all of the flow's possible execution paths.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The flow id to associated the stored trace map with.
        traceMap - The trace map to store.

      • getFlowHistory

        FlowHistory<T> getFlowHistory(UUID flowId)
        Retrieve the FlowHistory for the given flow id.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The flow id to retrieve the flow history for.
        Returns:
        The retrieved FlowHistory.
